info.author: Konstantin Aslanidi
info.description: Building projects with STLport and without, MSVC runtimes 7.1 and 9.0, building and using several boost libraries, boost::python extensions, pythons 2.5,2.6,2.7, COM dll (in-process) and COM exe (local), console dll,exe and developing with Cuda. All these features may be taken in any combination, debug or release.
info.keywords: bjam, make, C++, STLport, boost, COM, Cuda
info.name: Building-C-projects-ots.make
info.summary: bjam-like library written in pure python
